title: Ranjan Mistry
text: Ranjan Mistry (Hindi: रंजन मिस्त्री ) is an Indian Social entrepreneur and Think Tank of Bihar. [ 1 ] [ 2 ]

title: Early life and education
text: Ranjan Mistry (Hindi: रंजन मिस्त्री ) was born on 14 March 1996 in Patna, Bihar, India, to Mr. Gopal Sharma and Mrs. Sudama Devi and raised in a lower-middle-class family. [ 3 ] [ 4 ] [ 5 ] [ 6 ] [ 7 ] [ 8 ]
